DOC.brief_title: ANCHOR ( Aneurysm Treatment Using Heli-FX Aortic Securement System Global Registry )
DOC.detailed_description: Study Arms : Abdominal Arm : Subjects abdominal aortic aneurysm require placement EndoAnchors™ level renal artery consider part abdominal arm . If renal artery visceral artery require ( ) chimney procedure ( ) , subject consider part Advanced Disease arm . Thoracic Arm : Subjects thoracic aortic aneurysm require placement EndoAnchors proximal leave common carotid artery ( LCCA ) distal celiac artery . Thoracic procedures require arch vessel transposition ( ) bypass procedure LCCA brachiocephalic artery , chimney procedure arch visceral artery ( ) , hybrid open-endovascular repair aorta consider part Advanced Disease Arm . Advanced Disease Arm : To collect data consecutively treat patient , Advanced Disease Arm comprise subject require placement EndoAnchors proximal LCCA visceral segment aorta distal celiac artery proximal renal artery . Subjects thoracic procedure require arch vessel transposition ( ) bypass ( except leave subclavian artery ) hybrid open-endovascular procedure well abdominal thoracic procedure require chimney procedure renal visceral artery also include Advanced Disease arm . Primary Group : Assess Aptus HeliFX Aortic Securement System place time initial endograft implantation , either prevent endograft migration Type Ia endoleak , treat Type Ia endoleak evident time implantation . Revision Group : Assess Aptus HeliFX™ Aortic Securement System subject previously implant commercial endografts , prevention graft migration treatment Type Ia endoleak .
DOC.criteria: Subjects asymptomatic , symptomatic , rupture abdominal aortic aneurysm Subject ≥ 18 year old Subject provide write informed consent , either less equal 30 calendar day index procedure Subject willing able comply standard care followup evaluation Subject previously implant endograft ( Revision Group ) , undergo repair ( Primary Group ) , one follow aortic aneurysm endograft device : Cook Zenith Cook Zenith TX2 Gore Excluder TAG Medtronic AneuRx Medtronic Talent Medtronic Endurant Valiant Any additional third party AAA endograft device commercially available list compatible Aptus HeliFX EndoAnchor System Instructions Use Subject 's iliac/femoral access compatible 16 French sheath ( abdominal subject ) 18 French seath ( thoracic subject ) Selected 16 18 French sheath , applicable device select use ( advanced disease subject ) Subject previously implant endograft migrate Type Ia endoleak within aorta ( Revision Group ) undergo implantation endograft opinion Investigator increase risk complication ( Primary Group ) Subject know allergy EndoAnchor implant material ( nickel , chromium , molybdenum , cobalt ) Subject life expectancy le 1 year Subject participate clinical study registry , Investigator 's opinion , may conflict may negative impact subject 's safety Subject treat EndoAnchors segment aorta treat registry Subject active know history bleed diathesis Subject condition threatens infect endograft ( active bacteremia , infection carry increase risk endograft infection ) Significant thrombus calcium location plan EndoAnchor implantation precludes adequate EndoAnchor penetration aortic wall Use , whatever reason , EndoAnchor anticipate adequately penetrate aortic wall Subject aortic dissection invloves area treat EndoAnchors Subject Marfan Syndrome , Ehlers Danlos Syndrome , another collagen vascular disease Subject pregnant
